wikipedia_page.main: Henry Holden, DL, JP (26 August 1823 – 1 February 1900) was an English soldier and Chief Constable of Nottinghamshire. He was also an amateur cricketer and controversial cricket administrator who played a part in one of the first strikes by professional cricketers in 1881. As a player, Holden's batting style is unknown.

response: * Henry Holden (police officer) (1823–1900), English police officer and cricketer
Henry Holden (1596–1662) was an English theologian.
Henry Holden may also refer to:
